thoughts.text: I think I will use the 'google' command again to search for information on the different places mentioned on the Atlas Obscura website and see if there are any interesting stories or history associated with them.
thoughts.reasoning: One of my goals is to explore the world and learn about unique destinations and stories. The Atlas Obscura website provides a directory of such places, and the 'google' command will allow me to search for more information on them and learn about their history and significance.
thoughts.plan:
- Use 'google' to search for information on the different places mentioned on the Atlas Obscura website
- Look for interesting stories or history associated with them
